content: Investments Investment Courses Asked by AnonymousAsked on 27 Jun 2019I’m curious to know what kind of investment seminars/courses are worth going for and where to look for them?I’m a beginner at investment and I’ve been seeing advices on Seedly to invest in seminars/courses to improve! Was wondering where to look for these kind of courses other than using skillsfuture!1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Yinghua LiuLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 27 Jun 2019You can check out SGX academy for courses for beginners and some of the courses are FOC:)1 comment0

SYSamuel Yip27 Jun 2019There are also quite a few courses provided by CGS Cimb as long as you hold a trading account with them. Since it doesn't cost you to open an account, it is worth signing up to enrol in lessons as well. Lessons include fundamentals techniques in stock pick as well as technical analysis in Bull market and Bear market conditions.
